name: Team Oceans
description:
welcome to Team Oceans, worst game ever :) #TeamSeas

made for Polymars' #SeaJam

how to play

You are a fish. use ←, ↑, ↓, → to move around and collect bad trash! You lose when trash gets past red line or you touch another fish. You can't win haha >:)

Turn on endless mode so you can't lose!

You can also collect rainbow bubbles! - It will speed you up for 3 seconds

menu

In menu you can use ← and → to change skins and space to play

You can choose one of 9 skins to play with: fish 1, fish 2, fish 3, fish 4, fish 5, fish 6, bob, amogus, FISH  

also please don't go over 9999 points game breaks when you reach that idk why
